EmailTemplate.name: Hilton_Follow up Mike Harris
EmailTemplate.subject: Office Depot Business {!Account.Cust_ID__c}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello {!Contact.FirstName},
I'm following up on my call. Please let me know when you are available to discuss important updates to your Office Depot Business account, {!Account.Cust_ID__c}.
Our in-store, Store Purchasing Card (Mobile SPC#) program allows for you to receive the in-store sale price or your business-discounted pricing (whichever is lower), including copy & print discounts when you shop at any of our retail locations!
Office Depot is not only for your office supplies, but also for your cleaning, janitorial, break-room and facilities products.
Office Depot Business Resources:
Customer Service Help Line - 1-888-777-4044 - Customer Service Representatives are product specialists best suited to Place Orders, handle item requests quickly, address Shipping Issues, Returns and Order Tracking requests.
Invoice Requests: inv-pods@officedepot.com
Billing Department - 800-721-6592, Opt 3 Email: abbillingsupport@officedepot.com
Electronic Commerce Support/Web Help - 1-800-269-6888
2019 Calendars & Planners - SKU# 9905912
https://view.publitas.com/office-depot-digital/calendars-planners/
Looking forward to speaking with you soon!
Sincerely,
Mike Harris
Sr. Business Account Manager-Office Depot, Inc.
9501 Amberglen Blvd., Suite 200, Austin, TX 78729
Tel: (855) 337-6811 ext 12843
michael.harris@officedepot.com
CONFIDENTIALITY NOTICE: The information contained in this email and attached document(s) may contain confidential information that is intended only for the addressee(s). If you are not the intended recipient, you are hereby advised that any disclosure, copying, distribution or the taking of any action in reliance upon the information is prohibited. If you have received this email in error, please immediately notify the sender and delete it from your system.
